autonomous_components.name: AutonomousHealthChecker
autonomous_components.description: Continuous system health monitoring and assessment

autonomous_deployment_steps.title: Clone Repository
autonomous_deployment_steps.description: Clone the A1Betting repository with autonomous capabilities

autonomous_deployment_steps.title: Autonomous System Setup
autonomous_deployment_steps.description: Initialize autonomous monitoring and optimization systems

autonomous_deployment_steps.title: Frontend Build
autonomous_deployment_steps.command: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

autonomous_deployment_steps.title: Start Autonomous Services
autonomous_deployment_steps.description: Start autonomous monitoring, optimization, and self-healing

verification_steps: Verify autonomous systems are running with ps aux | grep autonomous

autonomous_solutions: Autonomous health checker will detect and restart services
Self-healing system will attempt automatic recovery
manual_solutions: Check if backend service is running

autonomous_solutions: Autonomous optimizer will detect and clean up resources
Memory cleanup will be executed automatically
manual_solutions: Check system resources with htop or task manager

autonomous_solutions: Autonomous tester will detect and report failures
Quality metrics will identify problematic areas

autonomous_operations.overview: A1Betting platform includes comprehensive autonomous operations for self-management and optimization

health_monitoring.description: Continuous system health assessment and trend analysis

optimization.description: Intelligent detection and execution of system optimizations

documentation.description: Intelligent documentation generation and progress tracking

safety_mechanisms: Impact scoring - only executes high-confidence improvements
Rollback capability - creates backups before changes
Threshold limits - respects system resource limits
Human override - maintains logs for review
Graceful degradation - continues operation if components fail
